name: Inflection Pi
key_features: Voice and text interaction with real-time transcription
Accessible via web and mobile apps
pricing_model: Free tier with optional Pi Pro subscription
description: A personal AI assistant that engages in empathetic conversation over chat or voice.
long_description: Pi stands for "Personal Intelligence" and is developed by Inflection AI. It focuses on friendly, supportive dialogue and offers both text and voice interactions across web and mobile platforms.
